class_notes: This a course for beginners in ancient Greek. No prior knowledge is required, but it will demand an intellectual effort and commitment, which is well recognized as setting apart students of classical Greek. The objective of this class is to learn to read classical Greek texts in the original.
course_description: Fall. Introduction to the fundamental principles of classical Greek. Students will attain as rapidly as possible the ability to read and understand literary works.
sections: Class Nbr: 2024, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MWF 1-2:15p, Instructor: D. van Schoor, Status: Open
